ancestries.Name: Dwarf
ancestries.Description: Dwarves are a short, stocky people who are often stubborn, fierce, and devoted.

ancestries.Name: Elf
ancestries.Description: Elves are a tall, long-lived people with a strong tradition of art and magic.

ancestries.Name: Gnome
ancestries.Description: Gnomes are short and hardy folk, with an unquenchable curiosity and eccentric habits.

ancestries.Name: Goblin
ancestries.Description: Goblins are a short, scrappy, energetic people who have spent millennia maligned and feared.

ancestries.Name: Halfling
ancestries.Description: Halflings are a short, resilient people who exhibit remarkable curiosity and humor.

ancestries.Name: Human
ancestries.Description: Humans are diverse and adaptable people with wide potential and deep ambitions.

ancestries.Name: Leshy
ancestries.Description: Leshies are immortal nature spirits placed in small plant bodies, seeking to experience the world.

ancestries.Name: Orc
ancestries.Description: Orcs are proud, strong people with hardened physiques who value physical might and glory in combat.

ancestries.Name: Athamaru
ancestries.Description: Athamarus are fish-like humanoids who form tight-knit communities underseas, with villages of siblings led by a common matriarch.

ancestries.Name: Azarketi
ancestries.Description: Azarketis, inheritors of a shattered empire's legacy, hold their proud traditions close but still surface to interact with the rest of the world.

ancestries.Name: Catfolk
ancestries.Description: Catfolk are highly social, feline humanoids prone to curiosity and wandering.

ancestries.Name: Centaur
ancestries.Description: Centaurs are half-human, half-horse nomads who range wild and free across their ancestral lands.

ancestries.Name: Fetchling
ancestries.Description: Once human and now something apart, fetchlings display the Shadow Plane's ancient influence through monochrome complexions, glowing eyes, and supernatural shadows.

ancestries.Name: Hobgoblin
ancestries.Description: Hobgoblins are taller and stronger than their goblin kin, often arranging themselves into military structures.

ancestries.Name: Kholo
ancestries.Description: Kholos are hyena-headed humanoids who embrace practicality and pragmatism.

ancestries.Name: Kitsune
ancestries.Description: Kitsune are a charismatic and witty people with a connection to the spiritual that grants them many magical abilities, chiefly the power to shapechange into other forms.

ancestries.Name: Kobold
ancestries.Description: Kobolds are small and reptilian, with features marked by the power they choose to follow.

ancestries.Name: Lizardfolk
ancestries.Description: Lizardfolk are scaled humanoids with a history that stretches into the distant past.

ancestries.Name: Minotaur
ancestries.Description: Minotaurs are horned, bovine humanoids who originate from an ancient divine curse. They are large, strong, and masters of crafts and puzzles.

ancestries.Name: Merfolk
ancestries.Description: Merfolk are a half-human, half-fish aquatic people who live in every ocean and sea of Golarion.

ancestries.Name: Nagaji
ancestries.Description: With humanoid figures and serpentine heads, nagaji are heralds, companions, and servitors of powerful nagas.

ancestries.Name: Ratfolk
ancestries.Description: Ratfolk are small, clever, and adaptable humanoids with ratlike features and a love of community.

ancestries.Name: Samsaran
ancestries.Description: Blue-skinned people who reincarnate upon death and recall pieces of their past lives.

ancestries.Name: Tanuki
ancestries.Description: Raccoon-like shapeshifters known for their mischief and magical transformations.

ancestries.Name: Tengu
ancestries.Description: Tengus are gregarious and resourceful avian humanoids who collect knowledge and treasures alike.

ancestries.Name: Tripkee
ancestries.Description: Tripkees are froglike humanoids whose spirit often exceeds their stature.

ancestries.Name: Vanara
ancestries.Description: Vanaras are inquisitive and mischievous monkey-like humanoids with long, prehensile tails.

ancestries.Name: Wayang
ancestries.Description: Small people native to the Netherworld, immigrated to Golarion after Earthfall.

ancestries.Name: Anadi
ancestries.Description: Reclusive, sapient spiders who hail from the jungles of southern Garund.

ancestries.Name: Android
ancestries.Description: Technological wonders from another world, androids have synthetic bodies and living souls.

ancestries.Name: Automation
ancestries.Description: Automatons are intelligent constructs housing actual souls, remnants of a dying empire's final attempt at greatness, blending technological ingenuity with magical power into a unique existence on Golarion.

ancestries.Name: Awakened Animal
ancestries.Description: Awakened animals were once ordinary creatures until they gained sapience, bridging nature and society, with nearly any species capable of awakening, leading to diverse characters.

ancestries.Name: Conrasu
ancestries.Description: Conrasus are shards of cosmic force given consciousness, constructing intricate exoskeletons to interact with the mortal world, both integral to the universe's processes and yet strangely set apart, seeking guidance from aeons to understand their existence.

ancestries.Name: Fleshwarp
ancestries.Description: Fleshwarps are individuals whose bodies have been radically transformed by magic, alchemy, or unnatural energies, often struggling to find acceptance due to their unorthodox appearance.

ancestries.Name: Ghoran
ancestries.Description: These intelligent plant beings, created by a long-dead druid, possess a form of immortality through their seedsâ€”unless destroyed by external forces beyond time's decay.

ancestries.Name: Goloma
ancestries.Description: Golomas fear most people and use their unusual biology to deter perceived predators; rarely seen and poorly understood, their many-eyed, wooden-faced visages instill terror in those they encounter.

ancestries.Name: Kashrishi
ancestries.Description: Kashrishi are quiet, stout beings with durable frames and distinctive crystalline horns, living in remote areas; their inherent psychic abilities make them natural empaths but sometimes burden them with the unceasing thoughts of others.

ancestries.Name: Poppet
ancestries.Description: Poppets are small constructs that assist with simple tasks, but some gain sapience, independence, and a spark of life, allowing them to chart their own destinies.

ancestries.Name: Sarangay
ancestries.Description: Powerful carabao-headed warriors from the isles of Minata, known for the magical gems in their foreheads said to contain their souls.

ancestries.Name: Shisk
ancestries.Description: Shisks are secretive, bone-feathered humanoids who dwell in mountains and lurk underground in dark tunnels and caverns, venturing into the outside world only to collect and protect esoteric knowledge.

ancestries.Name: Shoony
ancestries.Description: Diminutive humanoids resembling squat, bipedal dogs, shoonies are often mistaken for weak pacifists, but their perseverance, work ethic, and resourceful diplomacy make them far from helpless.

ancestries.Name: Skeleton
ancestries.Description: Skeletons are among the lowest types of undead, typically mindless and lacking many abilities that make other undead a serious threat, but the animated bones of dragons, giants, and great beasts can be dangerous foes; powerful creatures may retain some might and intellect upon returning as skeletons, and necromancers often turn strong enemies into skeletal servantsâ€”if they can maintain control.

ancestries.Name: Sprite
ancestries.Description: Sprites are diminutive, whimsical, and exuberant creatures from the fey realm known as the First World, loving pranks, exploration, and all things magic.

ancestries.Name: Strix
ancestries.Description: Known as Itarii in their own language, strix are reclusive avian humanoids devoted to their homelands and tribes, defending their precious communities with broad wingspans and razor talons.

ancestries.Name: Surki
ancestries.Description: Surkis are only now emerging from the subterranean Darklands in a generational dig to the surface. This insectile and highly metamorphic species subsists on the latent magic in the world around them. Once they have refined enough, Surkis are capable of developing unique adaptations that allow them to project magic in diverse ways, from digging claws to energized wings.

ancestries.Name: Vishkanya
ancestries.Description: Vishkanyas are ophidian(snakelike) humanoids who carry potent venom within their blood and saliva. Largely misunderstood due to old tales of their toxicity and natural finesse, vishkanyas work to grow into more than just what stories paint them to be.

ancestries.Name: Yaksha
ancestries.Description: Divine spirits who emigrated to Golarion from the first world.

ancestries.Name: Yaoguai
ancestries.Description: Beings who usually begin their existence as simple animals, objects, or plants, but have found a means to transcend their original forms through the power of cultivation.
